JEVGENIJ IVANOV
DEVELOPER PORTFOLIO

Software and Games

Dungeon Forge

March 26, 2024

Godot 4 extension plugin that allows users to generate dungeon-like layouts in their scenes with a click of a button.

Spotify Playlist Enhancer

January 12, 2024

Google Chrome Extension that allows users to authenticate their Spotify account, view their top 5 played tracks, get top 5 recommended tracks, and generate new playlists based on these tracks, all within the browser. Play these songs inside the extension right there and now.

Slayer

October 02, 2023

Slayer is an exciting top-down isometric roguelike game that immerses players in a world of strategic combat and character progression. Choose from three distinct classes—Mage, Barbarian, and Rogue—and embark on thrilling adventures, battling fierce enemies and mastering powerful abilities.

Combat Clicker

March 22, 2022

Combat Clicker is a browser-based, turn-based game where you face off against a cunning rat warrior. Outthink and outmaneuver the rat to claim victory!
